mapper.insert: insert into t_customer_contact (id, cus_id, contact_time, address, overview, create_date, update_date, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_customer_contact set cus_id = #{cusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact_time = #{contactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, overview = #{overview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cus_id, contact_time, address, overview, create_date, update_date, is_valid from t_customer_contact
mapper.sql: id, cus_id, contact_time, address, overview, create_date, update_date, is_valid
